constraint.display: Requires CAN Receive Interrupt enabled
Requires CAN Transmit Interrupt enabled
Requires CAN Error Interrupt enabled
Requires CAN callback to be an application function name (not NULL).
Only one driver instance is allowed per CAN channel
Driver instances must have unique names
Name must be a valid C symbol
Value must be a non-negative integer

option.display: Priority 3 (CM4: valid, CM0+: lowest - not valid if using ThreadX)
Priority 15 (CM4: lowest - not valid if using ThreadX, CM0+: invalid)
